aka: Once Upon a Time... The Discoverers

cast.name: 帕特里克·普雷让 Patrick Préjean

this_title: Il était une fois... les découvreurs
trans_title: Once Upon a Time... The Discoverers
introduction: 以动画的形式介绍各种重大发明The StoryHere we tell the exciting story of the great discoveries and of those who made them, thus shaping the world to make it what it is today. From Chinese writing to the invention of the automobile, taking us from electricity, to vaccination, measurements, etc. Maestro guides us through the centuries introducing us to the greatest scholars...The episodes of the seriesThe Chinese, our ancestorsArchimedes and the GreekHero from AlexandriaThe measuring of timeHenri the navigator and cartographyGutenberg and printingDe Vinci, a jack-of-all tradesThe doctors (Paracelse, Vésale, Paré, etc.)GalileoNewtonBuffon (discovering the past)Lavoisier and chemistryStephenson, full steam aheadFaraday and electricityDarwin and evolutionMendel and peasPasteur and micro-organismsThomas Edison and applied scienceMarconi and sound wavesFord and the adventure of motorcarAviationMarie CurieEinsteinLorenz, father of the geeseArmstrong, the moon and the spaceTomorrow
foreign_title: Il était une fois... les découvreurs
